summary: The diff implements an admin-only dashboard gated by a URL-hash token, adds backend support for order status + status-event timeline with an update API, adds admin UI hooks/actions for status updates plus list filters/sorting, and introduces separate customer/admin APK configuration with an admin-only download button. However, the admin order list does not clearly include UTR and paid date/time as required, and the order detail timeline display cannot be confirmed from the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin order list must include (at minimum) UTR (if available) and paid date/time (if available) along with payment status.
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented OrdersTable shows a payment badge and `paidVia` text but does not display `paymentConfirmation.utr` or `paymentConfirmation.paidAt` (paid date/time) in the list view.

missing_requirements.requirement: Order detail view must show a chronological timeline including created time, each status change time, and payment confirmation time (when available).
missing_requirements.reason: OrderDetailView is truncated before showing whether `statusEvents` and payment confirmation time are rendered as a readable chronological timeline; this cannot be verified from the provided diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Automatic periodic refresh (polling) of admin orders every 30 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for polling/auto-refresh; it only requires orders to render and reflect status after refresh/reload.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional backend query endpoint `getOrderStatusTimeline` for status events.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 allows either enriching `getAllOrders` or adding an additional endpoint; since `getAllOrders` is already enriched, this extra endpoint is not explicitly requested.
